script.body:
There can be a mismatch between the signals the algorithm picks up on and what we think they mean.

We want to try sharing the data that goes into these profiles.

Learning what content you interact with most can help us keep you on our platform longest.

Here's how we've been weighing your interactions:

What if you could control these weightings? You can drag the bars above to change what the algorithm values more.

On the upcoming screens, we try to be more transparent, too; click the menu on the bottom left to see the data we collect on you in real time.

script.title: New Feature
script.body:
We hope that providing some transparency on how we're interpreting your interactions and what data we collected can help you engage with our app with greater control.

We're experimenting with a new feature where you can select from a number of algorithms to use in our app.
